featured.text: A triumph for medical technology, Oddsson’s fish skin transplantation was actually part of the astonishing achievement of “100% Fish,” an ambitious task in promoting environmental efficiency.
But Oddsson’s life was saved by a creative invention: transplanting codfish skins onto human bodies.
Cod skin, for example, is made into calcium supplement and energy drinks, and even as material for skin transplantation as in Oddsson’s case.
Petur Oddsson was an important member of the Icelandic project.

definition.zh_def: 奇數的，古怪的，不尋常的
definition.example: His oddsson behavior made everyone question his intentions.
